3.10.0.0.message: Improved the error message which occurred when an anonymous consumer was configured but did not exist.

3.8.0.0.message: Fix an issue of realm field not recognized for older kong versions (before 3.6)

3.7.1.0.message: Fix an issue of realm field not recognized for older kong versions (before 3.6)

3.6.1.5.message: Fix an issue of realm field not recognized for older kong versions (before 3.6)

3.6.0.0.message: Add missing WWW-Authenticate headers to 401 response in basic auth plugin.

3.0.0.0.message: Updated the priority for some plugins.: `basic-auth` changed from `1001` to `1100`
